lexUnit.name: volunteer.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: freely offer to do something.

sentence.text: ` I take it you 're volunteering , " said McGann .

` I 'll go , " volunteered a fair-haired chap .

` I 'll keep an eye on him , " volunteered Sister Agape .
